title: Core Orchestrator Event Stream
description: Schema for the canonical list of orchestrator events emitted during a CI run.

items.description: Single event emitted by the orchestrator capsule.

id.description: Stable identifier for the event instance.

event.description: The event name or type emitted by the orchestrator.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp marking when the event occurred.

payload.description: Arbitrary event payload; structure varies per event type.

meta.description: Additional metadata supplied by the orchestrator.
